'''Ashen Aratiku Wood "Nifty" Street Lamp''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Ashen Aratiku Wood "Nifty" Street Lamp is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Tequemecan Valley}} after defeating {{Enemy|Tepetlisaurus Warrior: Shard Striker|x=1}}, {{Enemy|Forged Sand Interrogator|x=1}}, {{Enemy|Forged Sand Shieldbreaker|x=1}}, and {{Enemy|Tepetlisaurus|x=1}}.
